statements: UPDATE CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences SET purchase_history = '{"item": "shoes", "price": 50}' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences SET preferences = '{"color": "blue", "size": "large"}' WHERE customer_id = 'a0ece3f5-c92c-4271-96c4-57557d312cc9';

UPDATE CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences SET preferences = '{"category": "electronics", "color": "blue"}', purchase_history = '[{"product": "smartphone", "price": 799.99}]' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences SET purchase_history = '[{"product": "laptop", "price": 1299.99}]', preferences = '{"category": "computers", "color": "silver"}' WHERE customer_id = '987e6543-21bd-34e5-b456-614174276890';
